title: How to Make a Holiday Dessert

steps.headline: Choose desserts with a focus on the season.
steps.description:
Pumpkins are readily available at this time of year, so they're an ideal choice for making desserts from. Some suggestions include:
Pumpkin pie
Chocolate lover's pumpkin pie
Sweet pumpkin dessert
Pumpkin s'mores
Pumpkin mousse
Pumpkin mousse parfaits

Pumpkin ice cream.

steps.headline: Use sweet potatoes for desserts for Thanksgiving.
steps.description: They have a perfect sweetness for desserts. Some suggestions include sweet potato pie and sweet potato and sago dessert.

steps.headline: Use cranberries.
steps.description: Cranberries aren't just for the sauce; they have quite a few possibilities for tasty desserts, including apple cranberry crumble, cranberry orange bread and spiked orange cranberry fondue.

steps.headline: Use pecans.
steps.description: A lovely nut traditional for Thanksgiving time, the dessert possibilities include pecan pie, pumpkin pie pecan candy, Make walnut and pecan torte and pecan shortbread.

steps.headline: Use apples.
steps.description: Apples are at their best this time of year. For desserts, you can't beat apple pie or apple crumble. You could also make apple dumplings or apple berry crisp.

steps.headline: Focus on Christmas pudding.
steps.description:
This is an excellent dessert for Christmas and there are many options from the warm and flaming traditional Christmas pudding to an iced fruity Christmas bombe. For some inspiration, here are a few suggestions:
Christmas pudding
Cold Christmas pudding
King George I's Christmas Pudding

Christmas ice cream log.

steps.headline: Make chocolate based desserts.
steps.description: The richness of chocolate is perfect for the Christmas celebration time.

steps.headline: Make tasty candy or baked treats for setting out on the buffet table.
steps.description:
Some choices that might work well include:

Date balls; roll these either in coconut or pistachios
Ma’amoul
Kahk (sweet dusted cookies)
Pistachio shortbread
Cake pops with piped icing henna designs
Date bars or date cookies
Macadamia cheesecake
Qatayef, an Egyptian sweet crepe stuffed with nuts or cheese (sweeten it for dessert); or 'ataif, walnut-stuffed pancakes.

steps.headline: Make sheer khurma.
steps.description: This is a tasty, gently spiced milk pudding which is traditional as an Eid dessert. Or make Lab-E-Shireen, a custard-based pudding also enjoyed for this occasion.

steps.headline: Arrange a sumptuous fruit bouquet as both a table centerpiece and dessert.
steps.description: Healthy and tasty, it's perfect for those who don't want to indulge in the more sugary desserts.

steps.headline: Celebrate New Year's Eve with some celebratory desserts:
steps.description: Raspberry champagne cake pops  New Year's Eve cake.

steps.headline: Celebrate a Mexican New Year with traditional desserts:
steps.description: Make buñuelos. These are a very popular dessert in Mexico, made just for this holiday. Buñuelos is a fried, sweet tortilla that is so delicious you'll find it hard to stop at just one. Make pan de campo. This is a famous, sweet type of bread that is served as a dessert for this occasion.

steps.headline: Celebrate a Chinese New Year with traditional desserts:
steps.description: Chinese almond cookies Sweet rice cakes Sticky New Year rice cakes Baked coconut almond sticky rice.

steps.headline: Celebrate the Fourth of July with festive desserts that are representative of the day.
steps.description:
Some examples include:

American flag cake or 4th of July Strawberry. Cupcake kabobs

Patriotic popsicles.

steps.headline: Celebrate Australia Day with some fun desserts with an Australian quality.
steps.description:
For example:

Lamingtons or Lamingtons Cake Pops

Pavlova.

steps.headline: Celebrate Canada Day with a Canadian flag cake and all things maple syrup.

text:
Thanksgiving dessert ideas Choose desserts with a focus on the season. Pumpkins are readily available at this time of year, so they're an ideal choice for making desserts from. Some suggestions include:
Pumpkin pie
Chocolate lover's pumpkin pie
Sweet pumpkin dessert
Pumpkin s'mores
Pumpkin mousse
Pumpkin mousse parfaits

Pumpkin ice cream. Use sweet potatoes for desserts for Thanksgiving. They have a perfect sweetness for desserts. Some suggestions include sweet potato pie and sweet potato and sago dessert. Use cranberries. Cranberries aren't just for the sauce; they have quite a few possibilities for tasty desserts, including apple cranberry crumble, cranberry orange bread and spiked orange cranberry fondue. Use pecans. A lovely nut traditional for Thanksgiving time, the dessert possibilities include pecan pie, pumpkin pie pecan candy, Make walnut and pecan torte and pecan shortbread. Use apples. Apples are at their best this time of year. For desserts, you can't beat apple pie or apple crumble. You could also make apple dumplings or apple berry crisp. Christmas dessert ideas Focus on Christmas pudding. This is an excellent dessert for Christmas and there are many options from the warm and flaming traditional Christmas pudding to an iced fruity Christmas bombe. For some inspiration, here are a few suggestions:
Christmas pudding
Cold Christmas pudding
King George I's Christmas Pudding

Christmas ice cream log. Make chocolate based desserts. The richness of chocolate is perfect for the Christmas celebration time. Eid-ul-Fitr dessert ideas Make tasty candy or baked treats for setting out on the buffet table. Some choices that might work well include:

Date balls; roll these either in coconut or pistachios
Ma’amoul
Kahk (sweet dusted cookies)
Pistachio shortbread
Cake pops with piped icing henna designs
Date bars or date cookies
Macadamia cheesecake
Qatayef, an Egyptian sweet crepe stuffed with nuts or cheese (sweeten it for dessert); or 'ataif, walnut-stuffed pancakes. Make sheer khurma. This is a tasty, gently spiced milk pudding which is traditional as an Eid dessert. Or make Lab-E-Shireen, a custard-based pudding also enjoyed for this occasion. Arrange a sumptuous fruit bouquet as both a table centerpiece and dessert. Healthy and tasty, it's perfect for those who don't want to indulge in the more sugary desserts. New Year dessert ideas Celebrate New Year's Eve with some celebratory desserts: Raspberry champagne cake pops  New Year's Eve cake. Celebrate a Mexican New Year with traditional desserts: Make buñuelos. These are a very popular dessert in Mexico, made just for this holiday. Buñuelos is a fried, sweet tortilla that is so delicious you'll find it hard to stop at just one. Make pan de campo. This is a famous, sweet type of bread that is served as a dessert for this occasion. Celebrate a Chinese New Year with traditional desserts: Chinese almond cookies Sweet rice cakes Sticky New Year rice cakes Baked coconut almond sticky rice. National day dessert ideas Celebrate the Fourth of July with festive desserts that are representative of the day. Some examples include:

American flag cake or 4th of July Strawberry. Cupcake kabobs

Patriotic popsicles. Celebrate Australia Day with some fun desserts with an Australian quality. For example:

Lamingtons or Lamingtons Cake Pops

Pavlova. Celebrate Canada Day with a Canadian flag cake and all things maple syrup.
